page.description: Reads the contents of a text file in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: fileName
argument.description: The name of the file to read.

argument.name: onReadFile
argument.description: A javascript function to call when the file read succeeds.

argument.name: onReadFileERROR
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to read the file.

page.discussion: The phoneGapReadFile method reads the contents of a text file in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onReadFile function if the method succeeded. Calls the onReadFileERROR function is the method failed.
